summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: the Contact section Business Hours now displays only “Always Open”, and a new LogoMark component improves logo contrast/visibility while keeping the same asset path and preserving aspect ratio in both header and footer.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded client-side contact form behavior (validation errors, submitted state, success alert, and form reset logic).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope was limited to updating Business Hours text and improving logo visibility; additional contact form UX/validation changes were not requested (though still UI-only).
